Oh my hell, I can't believe you asked that Frank !!!!  LOL
Are you talking =
about a gift certificate for a ghost hunter?  LOL
OR are you talking about =
getting certified as a ghost hunter?  LOL
 
Seriously: Alot of the more WEL=
L KNOWN ghost hunting groups ( TAPS)
and any team affiliated with TAPS have=
 different courses that people can
PAY FOR and get a certificate saying the=
y are professional ghost
hunters.
Example: go to Daytona Beach Paranormal G=
roup. There are alot of classes
on that website.... 
Why don't you offer so=
me courses on how to make your own box ( Online)
You could make some money =
Frank..... 
 
 

________________________________

 F-S
